name: CreateNewTeam
description:
Create a new team for collaboration.

Use this tool to create a new team on the platform, facilitating collaboration and organization. It returns details about the newly created team.

parameters.name: team_name
parameters.description: The name to assign to the newly created team.

parameters.name: user_ids_to_add
parameters.description: A list of user IDs to include in the new team. Each user ID should be a string.

value_schema.description: The list of user IDs to add to the team.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the pylon API.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: The list of user IDs to add to the team.

value_schema.description: The list of user IDs to add to the team.
